Usage: apic create --type model-swiftserver OPTIONS

  Create a model definition in a Swift Server Generator application

  Options
  --name NAME                      name of the model

  Stability: prototype

  Create a model
  $ apic create --type model-swiftserver
  ? Enter the model name: book
  ? Custom plural form (used to build REST URL): books
  Let's add some book properties now.

  Enter an empty property name when done.
  ? Enter the property name: title
  ? Property type: string
  ? Required? No
  ? Default? No
  ? Enter the property name:
